headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' blob:; script-src-elem 'self' blob:; connect-src 'self' https://*.google.com https://*.gstatic.com https://maps.googleapis.com https://www.google.com; img-src 'self' data: https://*.googleusercontent.com https://*.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; object-src 'none'
